Chapter 7 Trustee's Report of No Distribution: I, Michael C. Koehn, having been appointed trustee of the estate of the above-named debtor(s), report that I have neither received any property nor paid any money on account of this estate; that I have made a diligent inquiry into the financial affairs of the debtor(s) and the location of the property belonging to the estate; and that there is no property available for distribution from the estate over and above that exempted by law. Pursuant to Fed R Bank P 5009, I hereby certify that the estate of the above-named debtor(s) has been fully administered. I request that I be discharged from any further duties as trustee. Debtor appeared. Key information about this case as reported in schedules filed by the debtor(s) or otherwise found in the case record: This case was pending for 4 months. Assets Abandoned (without deducting any secured claims): $ 70627.33, Assets Exempt: Not Available, Claims Scheduled: $ 177627.24, Claims Asserted: Not Applicable, Claims scheduled to be discharged without payment (without deducting the value of collateral or debts excepted from discharge): $ 177627.24. (Koehn, Michael) (Entered: 06/08/2012)

Final Decree: This bankruptcy estate having been fully administered within the meaning of 11 U.S.C. 350(a) and Fed. R. Bankr. P. 3022, the trustee is hereby discharged and the trustee's bond is hereby canceled. This case is closed. (Admin.) (Entered: 07/30/2012)
